markdownContent:
«Sorry, the museum's closed on Mondays. We're open Tuesday to Sunday, 10 to 5.»

«Ah, I'm not a visitor, I'm starting an internship here today.»

«Perfect, you must be the person Alex has sent to us then! Great, two more helping hands in the house.»

Somewhat suspicious about how exactly you came to this position and who did whom a favor, you shake his hand and introduce yourself.

«Nice to meet you too, I'm Frederic Luzon, the collection manager. It's great to have some support over the summer, these objects won't go into the database themselves! I'm guessing you're supposed to see Laura first, shall I bring you to her?»
